price: ហើយយើងបានបង្កើតសម្រាប់ពួកគេនូវអ្វីដែលពួកគេ អាចជិះដូចគ្នានឹងវា(សំពៅ)ដែរ។
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
